message.modTARSNavigationUpdating: [TARS] Updating navigation system. This may take a few seconds.

prompt.modTARSTarsDeleteConfirm: Are you sure to want to delete {0}

ModTARSTars.name: TARS
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonAquireItemTooltip: Instruct TARS to acquire the selected item.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonBuildDoodadTooltip: Instruct TARS to acquire the item for the selected doodad and build it.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonTameCreatureTooltip: Instruct TARS to tame the selected creature.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonSailToCivilizationTooltip: Instruct TARS to sail to civilization. It will acquire the necessary items to do so.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonDebugLoggingTooltip:
Enables extra debug logging to the console
Warning: This may significally decrease performance.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonExploreIslandsTooltip:
Allow TARS to explore other islandsafter it makes a base, equipment, and has enough resources for traveling.
Note: This has no effect when in a multiplayer game.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonQuantumBurstTooltip:
Allow TARS to harness the power of interdimensional energy allowing for quantum computating.
Warning: The cooldown after disabling this is directly proportional to the time active
Note: This has no effect when in a multiplayer game.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonStayHealthyTooltip: Allow TARS to recover health, stamina, hunger, and thirst when necessary.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonGoodCitizenTooltip:
Instruct TARS to be nicer in multiplayer games.
- Do not take items from other players chests.
- Do not dismantle/disassemble items that other players crafted.
- Do not pickup/rearrange objects placed by other players.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonUseOrbsOfInfluenceTooltip: Allow TARS to use Orbs of Influence when necessary.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonClearSwampsTooltip:
Allow TARS to remove swamp tiles that are around the base.
Note: TARS will not clear swamps when on a Wetlands island.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonOrganizeBaseTooltip: Allow TARS to periodically cleanup the area around the base by moving items into chests.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonAllowBackpacksTooltip: Allow TARS to use backpacks for organizational purposes.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonMaintainLowDifficultyTooltip: Allow TARS to periodically fish in order to increase its reputation to lower the difficulty.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonDisallowProtectedItemsToolti: Prevents TARS from using Protected Items.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonAllowProtectedItemsTooltip: Allow TARS to use all Protected Items.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonAllowProtectedItemsForEquipm: Allow TARS to equip Protected Items.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonLockInventoryTooltip: Prevents TARS from moving existing inventory items into chests
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonLockEquipmentTooltip: Prevents TARS from changing equipped items.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonAllowProtectedItemsWithBreak: Allow Protected Items that are durable

Allow TARS to use Protected Items that have a durability above 5.
TARS will not use Protected Items when the durability is too low.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonSimpleTooltip: Simple planning that works well for most scenarios.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonAccurateTooltip:
Smarter planning that results in more accurate paths.
Planning will take longer / be more expensive.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonAllowCavesTooltip: Allow TARS to go into caves for resources.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonGardenerOnlyEdiblePlantsTool: Instruct TARS to only plant things are that edible.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonHarvesterOnlyUseHandsTooltip: Instruct TARS to only use hands to harvest.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonPrecognitionTooltip: Allow TARS to find treasure without needing tattered maps.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonOnlyDiscoverTreasureTooltip: Allow TARS to only discover the treasure.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonDiscoverAndUnlockTreasureToo: Allow TARS to discover, then unlock the treasure.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonObtainTreasureTooltip: Allow TARS to discover, unlock, and grab the treasure.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonSpawnNPCTooltip:
Spawns a TARS powered NPC.
Note: This will automatically change the game to Simulated Turn Mode (similar to multiplayer)
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonLoadTooltip: Apply the configuration settings to the current TARS instance.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonSaveDataTooltip: Saves the current configuration as a new global data slot.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonImportDataTooltip: Imports a new global data slot from a file.
ModTARSTars.dialogModeGardenerTooltip: TARS will gather seeds and plant them to make a garden.
ModTARSTars.dialogModeHarvesterTooltip:
TARS will go around harvesting materials from nature.
Note: It will keep harvesting until there is nothing harvestable left in the world.
ModTARSTars.dialogModeSurvivalTooltip: TARS will setup a camp, gather resources, build equipment, stay healthy, and survive.
ModTARSTars.dialogModeTidyUpTooltip: TARS will tidy up items around the base by building & moving items into chests.
ModTARSTars.dialogModeAnglerTooltip:
TARS will go around fishing.
Note: It will keep fishing until there are no fish left in the world.
ModTARSTars.dialogModeTerminatorTooltip:
TARS will go around terminating hostile wildlife.
Note: It's recommended to only use this mode when TARS has decent equipment!
ModTARSTars.dialogModeTreasureHunterTooltip: TARS will solve maps and gather treasure.
ModTARSTars.dialogModeQuestTooltip:
TARS will work on completing quests.
Note: TARS only knows how to complete certain quests, such as the ones in the "Starter Quest" mod.
ModTARSTars.dialogRangeRecoverHealthThresholdTooltip: TARS will recover health once it hits this value.
ModTARSTars.dialogRangeRecoverHungerThresholdTooltip: TARS will recover hunger once it hits this value.
ModTARSTars.dialogRangeRecoverStaminaThresholdToolti: TARS will recover stamina once it hits this value.
ModTARSTars.dialogRangeRecoverThirstThresholdTooltip: TARS will recover thirst once it hits this value.
